title: Spicy Garlic Lime Chicken
description: A lime chicken recipe ready in less than 30 minutes. These skillet chicken breasts are perfect for a weeknight meal with rice and vegetables. A delightful lime chicken recipe with a little spicy kick.
steps: Mix together salt, black pepper, cayenne, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, thyme, parsley, paprika, and onion powder in a small bowl.
Sprinkle spice mixture generously on both sides of chicken breasts.
Heat butter and olive oil in a large heavy skillet over medium heat.
Sauté chicken until golden brown, about 6 minutes on each side.
Sprinkle with remaining 2 teaspoons garlic powder and lime juice.
Cook 5 minutes more, stirring frequently to coat evenly with cooking juices.
